verbs.description: Although many people [V: have] criticized the bizarre nature of Donald Trump ’s diplomacy with North Korea , his recent lovefest with Kim Jong Un does have the potential to reduce the dangers posed by nuclear weapons on the Korean peninsula . Even so , ...
